Text: hey, i can't open this with mobipocket reader, can u tell me what u use?
Thats because this is an .EPUB file. It can be read through adobe essentials and some Android tablets with a library.
@age331... download Calibre, it'll manage your ebooks and convert to the file needed for your device, it works with mobi,lit,epub,adobe, and others.

Thax for the torrent, really good book,
i recommend azardi to view it
